title_en: Topic Suggestions, Subscriptions and Reviews Please
title_zh: 主题建议，订阅和评论请

paragraphList.text_en: When it comes to managing life more efficiently, having access to the right tools and information is crucial. In the quest to provide valuable resources, I want to express my gratitude to all the listeners for their support of the podcast. Your engagement means a lot and has been truly remarkable. For those who have subscribed to the podcast on platforms like YouTube, Apple, or Spotify - thank you. If you haven't subscribed yet, I encourage you to do so on one or all of these platforms as it would be greatly appreciated.
paragraphList.text_zh: 当涉及更有效地管理生活时，获取正确的工具和信息至关重要。在为提供有价值的资源而努力的过程中，我想对所有支持播客的听众表达感激之情。你们的参与意义重大，真是令人印象深刻。对那些在YouTube、Apple或Spotify等平台订阅了播客的人，谢谢你们。如果你还没有订阅，我鼓励你在这些平台中的一个或全部订阅，将不胜感激。

paragraphList.text_en: Furthermore, for those who have enjoyed the podcast and feel it deserves recognition, leaving a five-star review on Apple Podcasts along with a positive comment can go a long way. Your feedback helps us improve and tailor the content to better suit your interests and needs. If you have any suggestions for future episodes or topics you would like us to cover, please feel free to share them in the comment section on YouTube.
paragraphList.text_zh: 此外，对于那些喜欢这个播客并认为它值得被认可的人来说，在Apple Podcasts上留下一个五星好评以及积极的评论会产生很大的影响。您的反馈帮助我们改进并调整内容，以更好地适应您的兴趣和需求。如果您对未来的剧集或您希望我们涵盖的主题有任何建议，请随时在YouTube的评论部分分享。

paragraphList.text_en: Recommendations are always valuable, so if you believe the podcast can benefit others in your circle, be it friends, family, or colleagues, sharing the podcast and its links can make a significant impact. Your support in spreading the word is truly invaluable in reaching a wider audience and helping more individuals navigate through life's challenges.
paragraphList.text_zh: 推荐总是很有价值的，所以如果你认为这个播客能让你周围的人受益，无论是朋友、家人还是同事，分享这个播客和它的链接可以产生重要的影响。在传播这个消息方面的支持对于吸引更广泛的听众，帮助更多人应对生活中的挑战是非常宝贵的。

paragraphList.text_en: In recent episodes, the importance of supplementation was emphasized, exploring both behavioral tools and specific supplements. It is vital to acknowledge that the supplement industry can be complex, with varying levels of quality among products. To address this, a partnership was established with Thorne, a reputable supplement company known for its stringent quality standards and trustworthiness. Thorne's products are endorsed by reputable institutions like the Mayo Clinic and major sports organizations, highlighting their commitment to excellence in quality control.
paragraphList.text_zh: 在最近的一些节目中，强调了补充的重要性，探讨了行为工具和特定的补品。必须承认，补品行业可能非常复杂，产品的质量各不相同。为了解决这个问题，与 Thorne 建立了合作关系，Thorne 是一家以严格的质量标准和值得信赖而闻名的优质补品公司。Thorne 的产品得到像梅奥诊所和主要体育组织这样的权威机构的认可，突显了他们在质量控制方面追求卓越的承诺。

paragraphList.text_en: For those interested in exploring supplements that are reliable and of high quality, visiting Thorne's website at thorne.com/u/huberman presents an opportunity to access a range of supplements, including those endorsed by myself. Additionally, by using the provided link, you can benefit from a 20% discount on any items listed on the page, as well as any other supplements available on Thorne's platform. This offer not only facilitates access to trustworthy supplements but also provides a cost-effective means of enhancing your overall well-being.
paragraphList.text_zh: 对于那些有兴趣探索可靠且高质量的补充剂的人来说，访问Thorne网站thorne.com/u/huberman 提供了一个机会，可以获得一系列补充剂，其中包括我所认可的补充剂。此外，通过使用提供的链接，您可以在页面上列出的任何物品以及Thorne平台上提供的任何其他补充剂上享受20%的折扣。这一优惠不仅有助于获得可靠的补充剂，还提供了一种经济有效的方式来增强您的整体健康。

paragraphList.text_en: In conclusion, the support and engagement of listeners play a pivotal role in shaping the direction and content of the podcast. By subscribing, sharing, leaving reviews, and providing feedback, you contribute to the growth and success of the podcast, ultimately enabling more individuals to benefit from the valuable tools and information shared. Similarly, exploring reputable supplement options, such as those offered by Thorne, can further complement your journey towards a healthier and more optimized lifestyle.
paragraphList.text_zh: 总之，听众的支持和参与在塑造播客的方向和内容方面发挥着至关重要的作用。通过订阅、分享、留下评论和提供反馈意见，您为播客的增长和成功做出了贡献，最终使更多人从共享的宝贵工具和信息中受益。同样，探索值得信赖的补充选择，比如Thorne提供的选项，可以进一步辅助您迈向更健康和更优化的生活方式。
